text.__SUMMARY__:
Brickellia secundiflora is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to central and northeastern Mexico from Tamaulipas west to Coahuila and south as far as Oaxaca.
VarietiesBrickellia secundiflora var. nepetifolia (Kunth) B.L.Rob.
Brickellia secundiflora var. secundiflora
